long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension allows you to insert a set of text which is separated by two spaces and a pop up whenever you visit a new page comes up telling you that info. It's a great way to learn new things! 

You have to set the things you learn by going to the extension clicking on it going to set words and then paste in a set of facts separated by two spaces and when ever you make a new tab it will pop up with a tab as long as it is turned on.
